posts.excerpt: In 1916, A group of prisoners plot their escape from the notorious fortress located in French Guiana.

posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Fabio’s work consists in helping ex prisoners to find their way in the outside world, but his quite life changes after he meets Mr Sparti, now he has to fight his own ghosts.

posts._title: Robin Anderson & Bob Connolly – Joe Leahy’s Neighbours [+ Extras] (1989)
posts.title: Joe Leahy’s Neighbours
posts.excerpt: This film is the follow-up to First Contact. It traces the fortunes of Joe Leahy, the mixed-race son of Australian explorer Michael Leahy, in his uneasy relationship with his tribal neighbours. posts.title: Je t’aime moi non plus
posts.excerpt: Quote:Serge Gainsbourg’s Je T’Aime Moi Non Plus, the iconic singer-songwriter’s 1976 directorial debut, is on the surface the story of a love triangle. But nothing about this film is conventional. posts._title: Marco Ferreri – Los chicos AKA The Children (1959)
posts.title: Los chicos
posts.excerpt: Ferreri’s film “Los Chicos” (The Boys) is about the lives of four lower-middle class Spanish boys coping with the effects of the Spanish Civil War. The film depicts an inhospitable urban environment, conflict between male and female adolescents, and an atmosphere of social imperfection. “Los Chicos” recieved negative reviews from parents, politicians and religious groups …

posts.title: Gaslight
